data.actual_result: The message goes and hides, and comes back afterwards
data.expected_result: The message shouldn’t disappear after opening the sercer
data.short_description: Unsent dm message disappears and reappears when opening server
data.steps_to_repro: - Start writing a message, but don’t post it, in a dm with a friend  - Before sending it, open a server - If you go back to the dm, the message will have disappeared, and you can write a new message - If you go into a second dm, and go back to the first one, the message will be back.
